SELECT seq_ticketing_sq.NEXTVAL AS ticketingSq FROM dual
INSERT INTO ticketing ( ticketing_sq, ticketing_date, user_sq ) VALUES ( #{ticketingSq}, SYSDATE, #{userSq} )

INSERT INTO ticket ( ticket_sq, ticket_no, ticket_seat, ticket_seat_price, ticket_stat, ticket_active, showing_sq, ticketing_sq ) VALUES ( seq_ticket_sq.NEXTVAL, #{ticketNo} , #{ticketSeatNo} , #{ticketSeatPrice} , 1 , 'Y', #{showingSq} , #{ticketingSq} )

INSERT INTO showing_seat ( showing_seat_sq, showing_seat_no, showing_seat_stat, showing_sq, seat_class_sq ) VALUES ( seq_showing_seat_sq.NEXTVAL, #{showingSeatNo}, 1, #{showingSq}, (SELECT seat_class_sq FROM seat_class WHERE show_sq = #{seatClassSq} AND seat_class = #{seatClass} ) )
